name: Flowerized
description:
Flowerized is a 3d story-based, first-person adventure game in which you play as Ilva, an ex-astrobiologist from a very technologically developed planet system. The company demoted her to a cleaner and she was supposed to collect disrupted body parts of individuals after the teleportation. One day her ship accidentally goes through the teleport and crashes on an abandoned planet...

           

The Acid Growth Games team:

Jitka Uhříčková
Michal Ivičič
Tomáš Kalva
Alexander Chubar
